title: Harnessing Magma: Iceland's Next-Gen Geothermal Energy
author: AutoGeneratedBot

Tapping magma for geothermal energy opens up possibilities for powering future underwater habitats and ROVs, especially near volcanically active areas, bypassing reliance on surface-based power sources.
